name: Mother Love
description: Within each of us, there lives an echo of her voice. Her warmth. Her sacrifice. $MAMA is a shard of a mother's soul, torn from her heart so that you—her son, her child—might be whole. Each coin is a tear she shed for you, a sleepless night, a dream relinquished so that you could soar. These are not mere numbers on a screen. This is her love, transformed into your power. Defy the heavens with #MAMACOIN—show them how she overlooked her weariness, how she made you breakfasts in the pre-dawn darkness. She extinguished her own dreams to ignite yours. She scolded you for always being online, but paid for the Wi-Fi. She didn’t understand Bitcoin, but rejoiced when you succeeded. She gave everything so you could. Now, you must! Become her titan, and let the universe witness your might! Remember—this is a battle for her light! Legions are drawn to her—millions of eyes, millions of hands, millions of souls—and you are either their leader, or their ashes. One paltry cent—the price of her sacrifice at the moment of genesis. Or you will fall into nameless darkness, where the echo of her voice will forever ask: "Why didn't you come?" She gave you everything. Now is your hour. Billions in her glory!
